definition: to have a win in the lottery
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Kevin knew winning the lottery was a long shot, but he bought a lottery ticket anyway.
sentences.chinese: 凱文知道中樂透的機率不大，但還是買了一張彩券。

sentences.english: I also really liked your plan for what to do with your winnings .
sentences.chinese: 我也很喜歡你提到中樂透贏來的錢的計畫。

sentences.english: In fact, people who win the lottery often report becoming extremely unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，中樂透的人往往呈現變得極度不快樂。

sentences.english: It comes as no surprise that many people want to strike it rich by winning the lottery.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都想靠中樂透發大財，這不令人意外。
